segments.text: What do you think of the new television channel ? Aren't the programs awful ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I quite agree with you . They are terrible . They are complete waste of time , but my wife disagrees with me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , what bothers me is the violence . There are far too many detective and police shows .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I couldn't agree with you more . There aren't enough educational programs , and even the news shows are not well done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are absolutely right . They are too brief . They don't tell you anything .
segments.speaker: S1
